body: So I just voted for the first time with this new method and after spinning I received an alpha crate, I swear I have like 20 of those... But what are you guys getting?
body_tagged: So I just voted for the first time with this new method and after spinning I received an alpha crate, I swear I have like 20 of those... But what are you guys getting?
title: What are you getting from your BP?

replies.body:
I got a beta crate for the first time, which is nice, except for the fact that I can't open it lmao

Maybe add crate key rewards as well ? Hmm
